text: Hey I know it sucks, but screw that person ok ignore him he's irrelevant. If bringing other people down makes him feel more elite or better than just leave him be.  He's still immature be the bigger person and forget about it. You're a great person don't let anyone bring you down.
Honestly it's strong to hold on, but it's even stronger to let go. So for that I really respect you and your decision.
